snippet: The TV show host is the most celebrated person known to become a new partner in the baseball team with the Wilpon family, who raised $240 million from selling pieces of the team.
abstract: Comedian Bill Maher acknowledges that he has acquired a minority share of the New York Mets.

byline.original: By ZACH BERMAN and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: The TV show host is the most celebrated person known to become a new partner in the baseball team with the Wilpon family, who raised $240 million from selling pieces of the team.

headline.seo: Bill Maher Now Owns Share of the Mets
headline.main: Bill Maher Now Owns Share of the Mets
